topic.title: Existence Of History Of Procedures - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.142"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67792-2" EMS existence of history of procedures (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10074)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10075)
If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "Refused " or "Unable to Complete," the value should be "NI"; the original value may be recorded in Observation.text. If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "None Reported," the value should be FALSE.
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67792-2" EMS existence of history of procedures (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10074)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10075)
If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "Refused " or "Unable to Complete," the value should be "NI"; the original value may be recorded in Observation.text. If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "None Reported," the value should be FALSE.

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.142"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1094807410"/> <code code="67792-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS existence of history of procedures"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="BL"/> </observation>
